name: Cure4Life
description:
Story

You're trapped in an abandoned room with some biological and medical equipment and workbench.

Strange zombie-like creatures are attacking this one room and your goal is not to die by upgrading yourself and your weapons.

Genre

Survival action game

Controls

WASD - move
Mouse - aim
LMB - shoot
E - Use/Craft
1,2,3,4 - Switch weapon

Team

Artem Shambalev aka Gipzo - Programming, Game Design, Sound
Vitali Poliakou aka Chimera - Art, Game Design

Music by

Kevin MacLeod (incompetech.com)

http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/3.0/

Update

Fixed some bugs and rebalance some things. Nothing major.
